content.rendered:
Kidney Disease Nutrition Program

Book Free Consultation

Program Description

Our kidney disease nutrition program is based on the principles of medical nutrition therapy, in which each diet plan is tailored to the individual’s unique biochemistry and medical needs to provide healing at the cellular level. The program typically includes recommendations for lowering salt, potassium, and phosphorus intake while maintaining adequate protein, vitamins, and minerals. The program’s goal is to improve kidney function, manage related health conditions, and improve the overall quality of life. The program may also include counseling and support to assist individuals in adhering to the diet plan and making long-term lifestyle changes.

Key Benefits of
this Program

Reducing the workload on the kidneys:
Proper nutrition can help reduce the amount of waste and toxins in the body, easing the burden on the kidneys. This can potentially slow the progression of kidney disease and prevent kidney failure.

Managing related health conditions: Many people who have kidney disease also have other health problems, such as high blood pressure or diabetes, which can wreak havoc on the kidneys. A balanced diet and proper management of these conditions, along with a nutrition plan, can help reduce the risk of complications and improve overall health.

Improving quality of life:
Proper nutrition can help people with kidney disease feel better overall, with more energy, a better appetite, and fewer symptoms like nausea, vomiting, and swelling. A well-balanced diet can also help you maintain a healthy weight and avoid malnutrition, which can lead to anaemia.

Price and package
details for program

Pakage Variation

It’s important to note that the cost of a kidney disease nutrition program may vary depending on factors such as the type and severity of kidney disease, other coexisting medical conditions, and the type and frequency of counselling and support needed.

Total Costing & Duration

Starting prices – INR 60,000

Duration -3 Months

Read Success Stories
from Our Client

Book Free Consultation

@graph.name: Kidney Disease, Renal Diet Nutrition Program - Echhajoshi
@graph.description: Our kidney disease nutrition programme is based on the principles of medical nutrition therapy. We help in Renal, Kidney patient & CKD diet Chart.

@graph.name: Echha Joshi
@graph.description: As a clinical nutritionist, my passion for personalized nutrition is driven by my unwavering commitment to helping individuals achieve optimal health and wellbeing. With a Postgraduate degree in Clinical Nutritional Sciences and a Master's degree in Clinical Nutrition, I possess an extensive understanding of the impact of different foods and nutrients on the body, and how they can be utilized to prevent and treat a range of health conditions. My approach to nutrition is both precise and tailored to each individual's unique needs. My personalized nutrition counseling takes into account medical history, lifestyle, and personal preferences, providing guidance that is both effective and enjoyable. I am experienced in working with individuals who have a wide range of health concerns, including diabetes, heart disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. Beyond my work in individual counseling, I am committed to promoting the importance of nutrition for overall health and disease prevention. My insights and expertise have been widely recognized and respected in the field, with several publications featuring my contributions. If you are seeking a refined, evidence-based approach to nutrition, I would be honored to connect with you. Together, we can work towards achieving optimal health and wellbeing, unlocking your full potential for a healthier and happier life.
